artist: artist: Frank Gaard , et al., artists; publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 16 pages, saddle-stapled; black-and-white publication with letters "A.P.B." at UR and an "Artpolice Bulletin" emblem with star at UL; main image is man at right in shorts and sneakers on a skateboard; image at left of woman with PR hand over her brow; sign below her asking "Where Have All The Young Men Gone?"; some inside pages are cover images from other issues; 2 color card inserts - one with tape and partial face cutout
title: Artpolice Bulletin
